'''1.21.131''' is a hotfix to {{BE}} released on December 16, 2025, which fixes some bugs.<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/41979788279181-Minecraft-1-21-131-Bedrock|title=Minecraft - 1.21.131 (Bedrock)|website=Minecraft Feedback|date=December 16, 2025}}</ref> This is the final version released in 2025.

== Changes ==
=== Items ===
'''[[Spear]]'''
* Increased the duration during which a spear can apply [[knockback]] while [[charging]].
* Charge attack animations now align more closely with the spear's gameplay phases (engaged, tired, disengaged) for improved visual feedback.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|project=MCPE|fixedin=1.21.131
|156784|Adventuring Time achievement unlocked without visiting 17 [[biomes]].
|232316|Escape key and Menu Cancel button stop working in the Marketplace home page after using the search bar.
|232978|Add-Ons preventing worlds from being opened (Block error code).
|otherissuescount=1}}
'''Other'''
*Fixed UI textures looking incorrect on Nintendo Switch when loading [[add-ons]] or connecting to servers.
